snippet: A mining company is proceeding with a project that could help revive Brazil’s economy, but it would also destroy caves treasured by scholars of Amazonian prehistoric human history.
abstract: Brazilian mining giant Vale is pushing forward with expansion of one of world's largest iron-ore mining complexes, project that will destroy dozens of caves that are treasured by scholars; caves contain spectacular mineral wealth, but also offer coveted insight into what may be earliest known stages of human settlement in world's largest tropical rain forest.
lead_paragraph: A mining company is proceeding with a project that could help revive Brazil’s economy, but it would also destroy caves treasured by scholars of Amazonian prehistoric human history.

headline.seo: In Brazil, Caves Would Be Lost in Mining Project
headline.main: Brazil Expands Mines to Drive Future, but Cost Is a Treasured Link to Its Past
headline.print_headline: Brazil Expands Mines to Drive Future, But Cost Is a Treasured Link to Its Past
